mapper.sql: ( SELECT fni.id, fni.form_id, fni.org_id, fni.node_code, fni.flow_code, fni.pos_x, fni.pos_i, fni.pos_y, fni.pos_z, fni.typ, fni.node_status, fni.status, fni.create_time, fni.create_user_id, cont.cont_code, tet.`name` as tenant_name FROM flow_execute_his feh LEFT JOIN flow_node_instance fni ON feh.form_id = fni.form_id and feh.node=fni.node_code and fni.flow_code=feh.flow_code left join zs_cont_info cont on fni.form_id like CONCAT('%',cont.ID,'%') left join zs_tenant tet on cont.renter_code = tet.`code` ) t left join flow_list fl ON t.flow_code = fl.flow_code left join flow_node fn ON t.flow_code = fn.flow_code and fn.node_code=t.node_code LEFT JOIN flow_execute_role fer ON t.node_code = fer.node and fer.flow = t.flow_code where 1=1 and fer.execute_role in #{item} and t.org_id in #{item}
